description: a(1) = 1, a(m+1) = sum_{k=1 to m}[GCD(m, a(k))].
comments: From _Ivan Neretin_, Apr 06 2016 (Start)a(n) >= n-1.All terms except a(3) = 2 are odd.For all n of the form 2^k+1 except 3, a(n) = n.(End)
links: Ivan Neretin, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..10000
author: _Leroy Quet_, Aug 04 2000
